long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Go to E-learning 3.0
2. Log in
3. Pin the extension
4. Click "Start Scraping" to begin downloading course files
5. If not working, refresh the website and try again

This extension is designed specifically for a group of students to scrape campus files. It only allows users to download their own files and does not permit the downloading of files belonging to others.
